item.description:
Join us for a special Pre-Thanksgiving turkey dinner at the Lansdowne Pub in Boston. This was a very popular event last year and the food was delicious! The chef has created a special menu for our group. Dinner is $25 + tax/tip and includes:

Roast turkey with gravy

Apple sausage stuffing

Roasted acorn squash

Mashed potatoes

Home made cranberry sauce

Warm Apple crumble cake with whipped cream

 

There is a full cash bar available. We will be hanging out at the pub afterwards or going to one of the local bars for post dinner drinks. This will be a great night, so be sure to join us for an early Thanksgiving celebration!

IMPORTANT NOTE: The Pub must have an accurate headcount since they are creating this menu just for our group. Therefore, please only sign up if you can definitely attend. Do not sign up just to hold your spot without knowing if you can make it. If your plans change, please update your RSVP as soon as possible.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near hostess stand or at our tables. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Special Pre-Thanksgiving Dinner and Drinks at the Lansdowne Pub
